meanings.definition: (adjective) having skin turned brown from exposure to the sun
meanings.sent1: After playing outside all day, her face was tanned from the sun.
meanings.sent2: She loved the beach and always came back with a beautifully tanned skin.
meanings.sent3: The tanned look made him appear like a seasoned explorer.
meanings.sent4: Her tanned complexion was a badge of honor from her outdoor adventures.
meanings.sent5: The tanned color of her skin was a testament to her love for the outdoors.

meanings.definition: (verb) to convert (animal skin) into leather by soaking in a liquid containing tannic acid
meanings.sent1: The shoemaker tanned the hide to make it into a durable leather material.
meanings.sent2: In the olden days, people tanned animal skins to create clothing and accessories.
meanings.sent3: The idea of tanning leather seemed like a strange alchemical process to the curious child.
meanings.sent4: The tanned leather gleamed in the sunlight, a testament to the craftsman's skill.
meanings.sent5: The smell of tanned leather filled the workshop, a reminder of the transformation process.
